prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a starfish with vibrant colors and shining features.
Show me a mystical Pokemon with a star shape and swirling patterns in shades of blue and pink.
Imagine a creature that glows underwater, featuring a bright yellow core and sharp, pointed edges.
Design a unique Pokemon that thrives in oceanic environments and has a stunning multi-colored appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea, with elegant shapes and a shimmering finish.
Make a Pokemon with a bright and colorful star-like body, perfect for underwater adventures.
Give me an aquatic Pokemon that combines beauty and strength, with a star-shaped silhouette.
